dmca.title: Acoustica Asks Google to Remove Cracks (#1)
dmca.body:
[private]

Subject: FW: [#9835896]

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA  94043

(xxx)xxx-xxxx  Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints


1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed upon.

Acoustica MP3 to Wave conversion blog
Easily Convert your MP3s, WMA and Wav files

Acoustica Mixcraft
Mixcraft is a music recording studio with real-time effects!
Acoustica CD/DVD Label Maker Software
Create your own CD/DVD labels and jewel cases!

Acoustica MP3 Audio Mixer
Edit your tunes or remix MP3s on your computer

Acoustica MP3 CD Burner Software
Burn music & MP3 CDs!  Easy to learn, easy to burn!

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.
See the website below.

FOR GOOGLE GROUPS, YOU MUST IDENTIFY EACH MESSAGE BY MESSAGE ID THAT ALLEGEDLY CONTAINS INFRINGING MATERIAL.

fide7.crackrtalks
alt.crack.nl
alt.pl.comp.os.hacking.cracki
alt.cracks
alt.2600.crackz
grk.comp.software
alt.cracks.nl.newbie
hr.comp.softver
soc.culture.Vietnamese
www.warzclub.uk

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred).

[private], Acoustica Inc., [private], Oakhurst, CA  93644
[private]

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Sign the paper.

[private]
Director of Sales & Marketing
